title: Mom's Zucchini Bread
directions: Sift together flour, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, baking powder, baking soda and salt into a large mixing bowl. Make a well in the center and add water, eggs, oil, pumpkin and nuts. Mix well. Pour batter into greased containers. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour or until loaves test done.
Makes 1 Bundt cake, or three 9 ½” X 5” X3” loaves or four 7 ¾” X 3 5/8” X 2 ¼” loaves or one 19” X 13” X 2” sheet cake. Baked loaves can be stored in the freezer for several weeks.
*You can use apple sauce, bananas, carrots, persimmon pulp, zucchini or other fruit puree to replace the pumpkin in this recipe and they all taste WONDERFUL.
